word:
The Lord could not now bring many souls into the truth because of the church members that have never been converted and those who were once converted, but who have backslidden. What good would these unconsecrated members do the new converts? They would make of none effect the message God 


                                    -149- 

has given His people to bear.--Ms 49, 1898, pp. 1, 2, 6, 14. ("Lack of Spirituality in Our Churches," April 9, 1898.)
